mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refresh_token ( user_id, token, expires_at, revoked ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{token}, #{expiresAt}, #{revoked} )
mapper.update: UPDATE refresh_token SET revoked = 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND revoked = 0
